mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUICK ( sendDate, sendTime, sendUser, destination, transType, transTypeName, memo, regUserId, regDate, isDelete ) VALUES ( #{sendDate}, #{sendTime}, #{sendUser}, #{destination}, #{transType}, #{transTypeName}, #{memo}, #{regUserId}, sysdate(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QUICK WHERE sendDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND isDelete != 'Y' ORDER BY sendDate, sendTime
